response.overview: Who said rain couldn't be sexy? Autumn in the UK brings rain every day and night. Heidi hates to travel with the London Tube at this hour since it is overcrowded and hectic. Instead, she goes home from work, as usual, drenched in rain, her hair soaked, and her makeup pouring. A sexual buzzkiller.But not today. Heidi is just wearing gorgeous blue lingerie underneath her stylish trench coat. She feels attractive and eager to charm her guy from the moment she walks in...
response.title: Rain Goddess
